name: Time Squad (dutchlish)
description:
Welcome to Time Squad!

Get to the other end of the world by helping from the future using a series of  characters, bombs, time-reversal and all round kewl. 

Set your current character up to help the next character get where they need to be. 

All will become clear!

After the jam is over I plan to iron out some bugs and add polish, then add more levels and worlds. I also plan to add a speed-run feature. 

NOTE 1: There's a reloading bug and I didn't have time to fix it, so if you get stuck from the second guy onwards (if you've mis-timed the time travel so to speak) then it's best to just walk into a spike to reset that level, pressing R will take you back to the beginning of the game unless you're on the last level in which case it'll take you back to the beginning of that level.

NOTE 3: Audio may be slightly too loud generally, I didn't have time to add a volume control.

All feedback welcome! :) 

Credits: 

Code, game design and art assets: Mike Bailey
